name: Moon Defender!
description: It's 500 years into the future, Dogecoin has become Earth's default currency, and a gigantic Dogecoin server has replaced the Moon itself!  Because of Dogecoin's rise to supremacy, Bitcoin extremists have grown rageful, and swear to destroy the Cryptocurrency at all costs!  Now, you must fly through space, blast your way through enemies, and defend the Moon Server at all costs, the world depends on it!
